actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to repeal the recently added limitation on Federal payments to States for skilled nursing home and intermediate care facility services under the medicaid program.

summary.text: Repeals the limitation on Federal payments to States for skilled nursing home and intermediate care facility services under the medicaid program.

titles.title: A bill to repeal the recently added limitation on Federal payments to States for skilled nursing home and intermediate care facility services under the medicaid program.
